caption.body: Australian filmmaker Michael Fletcher follows West Papuan fisherman Abdul Aziz as he captures small bait while forming a special bond with the whale sharks around his boat, teaching us how we can coexist peacefully with nature.   See “The Star Sharks” by Michael Fletcher in the Video Arts Gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal with daily operating hours of 7:00am to 10:00pm, or online at: https://bit.ly/3RlRPwL
caption.excerpt: Australian filmmaker Michael Fletcher follows West Papuan fisherman Abdul Aziz as he captures small bait while forming a special bond with the whale sharks around his boat, teaching us how we can coexist peacefully with nature.
